doc:
Lawrence Grant https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lawrence_Grant 0 Percy Reginald Lawrence-Grant (30 October 1870 in Bournemouth, Hampshire, England – 19 February 1952 in Santa Barbara, California, USA) was an English actor known for supporting roles in films such as The Living Ghost, I'll Tell the World, Shanghai Express, The Mask of Fu Manchu and Son of Frankenstein. He was host of the 4th Academy Awards ceremonies in 1931. Percy_Reginald_Lawrence-Grant ( 30_October_1870 in Bournemouth , Hampshire , England – 19_February_1952 in Santa_Barbara , California , USA ) was an_English_actor known for supporting_roles in films such_as The_Living_Ghost , I 'll_Tell the_World , Shanghai_Express , The_Mask of Fu_Manchu and Son of Frankenstein . He was host of the_4th_Academy_Awards_ceremonies in 1931 .
